CustomField.description: In approximately 200 words, describe the integrated approach to considering moisture control strategies to reduce risk for mold and damaging moisture. Please demonstrate worked in tandem with engineer -- address material selection, hyrgrothermal analysis (MPC #26)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Describe the integrated approach to considering moisture control strategies to reduce risk for mold and damaging moisture.
CustomField.label: Moisture Control Narrative
